summary: This is a staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for August 9, 2019. It details officer post assignments, shift changes, leave statuses, and overtime occurrences. The document is significant as it provides a detailed snapshot of staffing on the day Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell.

persons.name: Noel, T
persons.context: Listed as an officer assigned to a post, with overtime (OT) indicated.

persons.name: Thomas, M
persons.context: Appears multiple times in shift change records, noted as being on Sick/Annual leave and having assignments changed.

persons.context: Listed as the REC OFFICER #1 on the roster.

events.title: MCC Staff Assignment Roster
events.description: Detailed daily assignment roster for correctional staff at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

locations: MCC NEW YORK NEW YORK, NY
keyFacts: This is a staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York dated August 9, 2019.
The document details officer posts, shift times, leave statuses (Sick, Annual, AWOL), and overtime assignments.
It shows a total of 108 Correctional Services Staff and 18 Non-Correctional Services Staff were scheduled.
There were 29 Overtime Occurrences and 0 Comp-time Occurrences recorded for this date.
The document includes records of shift changes and status updates logged by various supervisors (e.g., KS, RW, JD, CP, DM, MC, TD).
